pullRequest.title: Introduce ProxyConfigSelector
pullRequest.bodyText:
Motivation
Relates to #2739
Introduce a ProxyConfigSelector which is analogous to ProxySelector.
By doing so, users may be able to dynamically adjust which proxy server to connect to.
Additionally, add a bridge class WrappingProxyConfigSelector which may allow users to re-use ProxySelector implementations.
Modification

Introduce a ProxyConfigSelector interface which invokes callbacks select, connectFailed when appropriate.
Introduce Static, Wrapping utility variants of ProxyConfigSelector
Add ProxyConfig to PoolKey and enforce channels to re-use connections by ProxyConfig also.
Each connection remembers the corresponding PoolKey to invoke connectFailed

Breaking Changes

ClientFactoryOption[s] now accepts a ProxyConfigSelector instead of a ProxySelector

nodes.bodyText:
I feel like this change deserves some explanation:
Endpoint.toUri requires a serialization format (which was always none before introducing this method)
However, serialization format may not necessarily be none. (i.e. tbinary calls with proxy)
On the other hand, a session shouldn't necessarily only use a single serialization format, hence I moved away from using Scheme for the callback methods.
Hence, I'd decided to omit SerializationFormat entirely from the uri scheme.

re-use -> reuse
